name: Sun Cycles Saga
description:
Read first:
You are the sun!  The day will cycle from light to dark.  Help as many plants grow as you can, but be careful not to dry them out!

Press A/D, Left/Right Arrow to move.
Each plant has different needs so be careful.
-Your goal is to make plants grow as much as you can by giving them light (if the sun circle touches the plants, they grow).
-When in direct sunlight, the plants also begin to dry, if they get too dry, they can die (and you lose score).
-When not in direct sunlight, the plants slowly become wet again.

In short:  give plants sunlight but don't stay on one plant too long or it'll dry out and die.
